name: Perfect Jump
description:
This is a relaxing casual game, you need to operate the character to keep jumping to get points

Perfect Jump is a simple and addictive hyper-casual game that anyone can play.
How to play:

Players may need to find the right time to control the character to jump to the next destination
It is recommended to jump to the rewarded target area to get points faster
Points can unlock more interesting skins
The difficulty of the game will gradually increase as the game progresses
The game is in the development stage, and new gameplay and modes will be added in the future
